top_comments.comment: Please do a Tech Analysis on PC

comments_since_last_sample.body: Can you get Alex onto the PC version and recommend his trademark optimized settings? I'm struggling.
Now things have drastically changed in the cloud, what about a NVidia Shield running the 3080 tier? This is out perforning the physical consoles now.
Can't help but think this game could really use a quality motion blur pass.
